entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
